title: Trump claims without evidence that his tariffs are matter of ‘national security’ – live
summary: The President advocates for tariffs, stating they are crucial for the nation's economic prosperity and survival. He warns that a court ruling against these tariffs could have devastating consequences. The comments reflect his strong belief in tariffs as a key component of his economic strategy.

title: Europa League: Aston Villa v Maccabi Tel Aviv, Rangers v Roma, and more – live
summary: Aston Villa will face Maccabi Tel Aviv in the Europa League, while Rangers are set for a challenging match against Roma. Michael Butler will provide coverage of the matches. This round promises intense competition for both teams as they aim to advance in the tournament.

title: Middlesbrough reject Wolves approach for head coach Rob Edwards
summary: Wolves' official request to hire Rob Edwards as their new head coach has been declined by Middlesbrough. The club is committed to retaining him despite the interest. Middlesbrough's stance underscores their desire to maintain continuity in their coaching staff.

title: For a few dollars, I bought a childhood game from the op shop. Watching my kids play felt like time had folded in on itself | Shadi Khan Saif
summary: A speaker reflects on the profound happiness derived from simple materials like wood, coins, and powder, highlighting the joy found in everyday items. This observation underscores the value of appreciating simple pleasures in life. The statement invites readers to recognize the happiness that can stem from uncomplicated joys.
